alert.note: Alert for St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:23PM EDT until June 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 723 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Ponte Vedra, or 8 miles northwest of Saint Augustine, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Nocatee, Durbin, Vilano Beach, South Ponte Vedra, Saint Augustine South, Guana River State Park and Saint Augustine Shores. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
